MatchedTranspiler.Name: AirtableToJson

ProjectTranspilers.Name: AirtableToJson
ProjectTranspilers.CommandLine: airtable/airtable-to-json -p baseId=$base-id$ -p entities=Widgets,Companies -p view=Grid%20view -p include-id-and-createdtime=false -p doublenest=false

MatchedTranspiler.Name: ODXMLToSMQL
MatchedTranspiler.Description: Extracts the roles and CRUD permissions from an ODXML file, and builds a matching SMQL file from those results.
